nodes.text: Phillip Berry is credited as a lead tester for Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic. He also is credited for the following games: Star Wars Battlefront: Renegade Squadron, Star Wars: Empire at War, Star Wars: Republic Commando, Star Wars: Battlefront, Star Wars: Rogue Squadron III: Rebel Strike, Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds, Star Wars: Jedi Starfighter, Star Wars: Starfighter, Star Wars: Demolition, Star Wars: Force Commander, and Star Wars: X-Wing Alliance.
